questions.answer: We are a leading provider of solar energy solutions in Sri Lanka. We specialize in residential, commercial, and industrial solar installations, offering end-to-end services from consultation to maintenance. Established in 2010, we have completed over 5000 installations across the country and are certified by the Sustainable Energy Authority. Our team consists of qualified engineers and technicians with extensive experience in renewable energy systems.

We offer a comprehensive range of solar services including solar panel installation, solar water heating systems, energy storage solutions, solar maintenance, and monitoring systems. Our team of experts will guide you through the entire process from initial consultation to post-installation support. We also provide energy auditing services, solar carports, and specialized industrial solar solutions. As an authorized dealer for leading global brands, we ensure you get the best quality products.

Our solar panels come with a 25-year performance warranty, and all installations are guaranteed for 10 years. Our inverters typically have a 5-10 year warranty, depending on the model. We also offer extended warranty options for complete peace of mind. All our warranties are backed by our dedicated service team and manufacturer partnerships.

The cost of a solar system depends on several factors including system size, type of panels, inverter specifications, and whether you need battery storage. Our residential systems typically start at Rs 500,000, while commercial systems are custom-quoted based on energy requirements. We offer financing options to make solar accessible to everyone. We also provide free energy assessments and detailed ROI calculations to help you make an informed decision.

Most customers see a return on their solar investment within 5-7 years. Monthly electricity savings typically range from 50% to 90% depending on your system size and energy consumption patterns. With rising electricity costs, your savings will likely increase over time. Our customers have reported average annual savings of Rs 180,000 to Rs 360,000 on their electricity bills.

Our battery storage solutions allow you to store excess solar energy for use during the night or during power outages. We offer lithium-ion battery systems that provide reliable backup power with long lifespans and minimal maintenance. Battery capacity can be customized based on your backup power needs. We partner with leading manufacturers like Tesla, LG, and Sonnen to provide the most advanced storage solutions.

The solar installation process typically takes 1-3 days for residential systems and 1-2 weeks for commercial systems, depending on complexity. Our process includes site assessment, custom design, permit handling, professional installation, and final inspection. We handle everything to make the transition to solar as smooth as possible. Our installation teams are certified and follow international safety standards.

Solar systems require minimal maintenance. We recommend annual inspections and cleaning to ensure optimal performance. Our maintenance service includes panel cleaning, system performance check, and inverter diagnostics. We also offer monitoring solutions to track your system's performance in real-time. Our service team is available 24/7 for emergency support.

We offer flexible financing options including zero-down payment plans, solar loans with competitive interest rates, and lease options. Our financing partners provide terms up to 10 years to make monthly payments comparable to or less than your current electricity bill. We also help you access government incentives and tax benefits for solar installations.

Yes, we support grid-tied systems with net metering, allowing you to sell excess electricity back to the grid. This effectively turns your meter backward when you produce more than you consume, maximizing your investment return. We'll help you with all the necessary paperwork to set up net metering with your utility company. Our systems comply with all CEB (Ceylon Electricity Board) requirements.

Quality solar panels typically last 25-30 years, with efficiency gradually decreasing to about 80% of their original output by the end of their life. Inverters generally last 10-15 years, while batteries (if installed) typically need replacement after 10-15 years depending on usage patterns and technology. We use Tier-1 panels from manufacturers with proven track records of longevity and reliability.

All our systems come with monitoring capabilities that allow you to track energy production and consumption in real-time through a smartphone app or web portal. This helps you optimize your energy usage and quickly identify any performance issues. Our smart monitoring systems include features like weather forecasting and automated maintenance alerts.

You can contact our team at info@smartsolar.lk or call us at +94 11 234 5678. Our office hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM, and Saturday from 9 AM to 1 PM. You can also visit our showroom at 123 Solar Lane, Colombo 5. We have regional offices in Kandy, Galle, and Jaffna to better serve you.
